Gun violence has traumatized an entire generation and will traumatize another unless we listen to survivors and finally get something done. #MomentsThatSurvive

She has since become a champion for gun safety and turned her tragedy into a force for change. 

I am proud to join her in fighting for that change. https://t.co/vJSufrePuG https://t.co/StlqR10Xl4
